Name: Meeting access SHALL be restricted to users signed in with a Google Account or Dialing in using a phone.
Meeting access SHALL be disabled for meetings created by users who are not members of any Google Workspace tenant or organization.
Host Management meeting features SHALL be enabled so that they are available by default when a host starts their meeting.
Warn for external participants SHALL be enabled.
Setting Name (Is): Warn for external participants External or unidentified participants in a meeting are given a label

Name: Users receive calls only from contacts and other users in the organization SHALL be selected.
Setting Name (Is): Incoming call restrictions Allowed caller type
